game.name: Seraphine's Skyward Journey
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: This game is an adventure game where you explore a steampunk-inspired world with 2.5D hand-drawn graphics aboard an airship. Manage resources like coal, food, and water while operating your airship, defeat sky pirates, engage in trade, and handle cargo transport as you venture into uncharted skies.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This game is an adventure game where you explore a steampunk-inspired world with 2.5D hand-drawn graphics aboard an airship. Manage resources like coal, food, and water while operating your airship, defeat sky pirates, engage in trade, and handle cargo transport as you venture into uncharted skies.
